entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near noon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this afternoon. High zero. Wind chill near minus 7. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Sunday 19 February 2023
